name: Nick Jr. Baby: Curious Buddies Gift Set (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Nick Jr. Baby: Curious Buddies Gift Set (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My 15 month-old niece and 7 month-old nephew absolutely love this show! Keeps them entertained and happy! I was so happy to find this gift set!
reviews.title: Love This Show!

reviews.name: Nick Jr. Baby: Curious Buddies Gift Set (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my grandson who just loves the Curious Buddies. He has learned so much from watching the buddies. Just wish I could find Let's Make Music DVD.
reviews.title: Great DVD

reviews.name: Nick Jr. Baby: Curious Buddies Gift Set (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My nephew adores this program! We rented it when he came to visit me and he was mezmerized by it! We bought him the gift set for his first birthday! Very cute program for toddlers!
reviews.title: Fun!!!

reviews.name: Nick Jr. Baby: Curious Buddies Gift Set (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: A very helpful learning product for my grandson
reviews.title: learning tool
